roleset.name: release from detention, put on parole
roleset.note: PAROLE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from parole.01-v)

example.name: parole-v
example.text: Two months later after serving fifteen of his eighteen year sentence [Vance Ladamie] was also paroled *-1.
example.arg: after serving fifteen of his eighteen year sentence

example.name: parole-n
example.text: “The damage is done; I have to live with this every day,” said Grubbs, 55, on parole from a 5 year burglary sentence.
